i1.name: Absolution
description: {{sbc|Innate - Weakened Soul}}: '''Senna's''' basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} and damaging [[champion ability|abilities]] on enemy champions apply a [[stack]] of {{as|Mist}} for 4 seconds, modified to {{fd|0.75}} seconds if '''Senna''' starts winding up a basic attack on them. Subsequent hits will collect {{as|Mist}}, dealing {{as|{{pp|1 to 10 for 10|key=%}} of target's '''current''' health}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}, and rendering the target immune to further {{as|Mist}} applications for a few seconds. This damage {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.

Enemies that die near '''Senna''' may spawn a ''Mist Wraith'' from their corpse. A ''Mist Wraith'' lasts 8 seconds and '''Senna''' can basic attack or hit it with ''{{ai|Piercing Darkness|Senna}}'' or ''{{ai|Dawning Shadow|Senna}}'' to kill them instantly, granting her {{g|8}} and collecting their {{as|Mist}}.
* Enemy {{tip|champions}} and large {{tip|monsters}} will spawn a ''Mist Wraith''.
* Epic {{tip|monsters}} will spawn 2 ''Mist Wraiths''.
* {{tip|Minions}} and lesser {{tip|monsters}} that '''Senna''' kills have a {{fd|8.{{Recurring|3}}}}% chance to spawn a ''Mist Wraith''.
* Large {{tip|minions}} that '''Senna''' does not kill will spawn a ''Mist Wraith'', while lesser {{tip|minions}} and lesser {{tip|monsters}} that '''Senna''' does not kill have a 28% chance to spawn.

{{sbc|Mist}}: For each stack of {{as|Mist}}, '''Senna''' gains {{sti|attack damage|{{as|{{fd|0.75}} '''bonus''' attack damage}}}}. For every 20 stacks, she also gains {{sti|attack range|20 '''bonus''' attack range}} and {{sti|critical strike chance|{{as|10% critical strike chance}}}}, capped at {{as|100% critical strike chance}}. Additionally, 35% of the generated excess {{as|critical strike chance}} is converted into {{stil|life steal}}.

{{sbc|Innate - Relic Cannon}}: '''Senna's''' basic attacks {{tip|on-hit}} deal {{as|20% AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and grant her {{as|{{pp|key=%|10 to 20 for 3|1;6;9}} of the target's movement speed}} as {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. This damage {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Weakened Soul: Senna's basic attacks on-hit and damaging champion ability on enemy champions apply a stack of Mist for 4 seconds, modified to 0.75 seconds if Senna starts winding up a basic attack on them. Subsequent hits will collect Mist, dealing 1% − 10 for 10% (based on level) of target's current health as bonus physical damage, and rendering the target immune to further Mist applications for a few seconds. This damage applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness.
Enemies that die near Senna may spawn a Mist Wraith from their corpse. A Mist Wraith lasts 8 seconds and Senna can basic attack or hit it with Senna's Piercing Darkness or Senna's Dawning Shadow to kill them instantly, granting her 8 and collecting their Mist. * Enemy champions and large monsters will spawn a Mist Wraith. * Epic monsters will spawn 2 Mist Wraiths. * Minions and lesser monsters that Senna kills have a 8.Unknown value: Recurring / 3% chance to spawn a Mist Wraith. * Large minions that Senna does not kill will spawn a Mist Wraith, while lesser minions and lesser monsters that Senna does not kill have a 28% chance to spawn.
Mist: For each stack of Mist, Senna gains 0.75 bonus attack damage. For every 20 stacks, she also gains 20 bonus attack range and 10% critical strike chance, capped at 100% critical strike chance. Additionally, 35% of the generated excess critical strike chance is converted into Unknown value: stil / life steal.
Innate - Relic Cannon: Senna's basic attacks on-hit deal 20% AD bonus physical damage and grant her 1;6;9 ‒ undefined of the target's movement speed as bonus movement speed for 0.5 seconds. This damage applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness.
i1.notes:
* Despite '''Senna''' dealing 1 damage to ''Mist Wraiths'', attacking them will calculate the {{as|attack's damage|AD}} (including {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers) and any [[on-hit]] effects for the purposes of {{stil|life steal}} and {{tip|drain}} effects.
* ''Relic Cannon'' is only applied if the attack deals more than 0 damage.
** Hence, it is not applied if the target is {{tip|invulnerable}} or '''Senna's''' basic attack's {{sti|{{as|attack damage}}}} is reduced to 0 or below.
* Dealing 0 damage is valid for marking and collecting {{as|Mist}} from champions, but dealing no damage at all is not.
** Hence, '''Senna''' can mark and collect from {{tip|invulnerable}} enemies.
** {{tip|Dodge}} prevents marking and collecting a {{as|Mist}} via '''Senna's''' basic attacks and {{ai|Q|Senna}}.
** {{Pending for test}}: {{as|Mist}} interaction with {{tip|block}} and {{tip|blind}}.
* {{ci|Nunu|Nunu & Willump}} spawn a wraith each.
* Enemies will not see newly spawned wraiths while '''Senna''' is not visible.
* {{tip|Minion|Minions}} executed by allies with {{nie|Spoils of War}} have a {{fd|4.166}}% chance to spawn wraiths.
* A wraith can be hit by {{ai|Cosmic Binding|Bard}} and it will interact with it the same way minions or monsters interact with Cosmic Binding but it will not take damage.
* ''Mist Wraith'' has a spawn animation, but is targetable immediately.
* ''Mist Wraith'' grants a small amount of {{tip|sight}} around itself.
* {{ii|Runaan's Hurricane}} secondary bolts will ignore ''Mist Wraiths''.
* Attacking a ''Mist Wraith'' will not consume energized stacks, but you can benefit from the range increase of {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}} when collecting wraiths.
* {{tt|Excluding|Due to lack of available metric}} the range increase and the bonus shielding on {{ai|Dawning Shadow|Senna}}, one stack of {{as|Mist}} is worth approximately {{g|{{fd|44.55}}}} ({{g|+8}} from ''Mist Wraith'' pickup), {{g|{{fd|32.8125}}}} if the critical chance is converted to life steal. The bonuses have a gross value of {{g|{{fd|46.25}}}} ({{g|{{fd|32.8125}}}} with life steal).
** {{sti|{{as|{{fd|0.75 AD}}}}}} is worth {{g|26.25‬}}.
** {{sti|critical chance|{{fd|0.5}}%}} [[Critical_strike#Critical_strike_chance|critical strike chance]] is worth {{g|20}}. ''Absolution'' reduces its efficiency by {{fd|8.5}}%, making the value {{g|{{fd|18.3}}}}.
*** {{sti|life steal|{{fd|0.175%}}}} [[life steal]] is worth ≈{{g|{{fd|6.5625}}}}.

q1.name: Piercing_Darkness
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' fires a spectral laser in the direction of the target unit, {{tip|heal|healing}} herself and allied {{tip|champions}} hit, and dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit in a thinner line. Enemies hit are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 15% {{as|(+ 10% per 100 '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}} for a few seconds. The damage {{tip|applies lifesteal|applies}} {{stil|life steal}} at 100% effectiveness.

Upon being hit, enemy {{tip|turrets}}, {{tip|wards}}, [[jungle plants]], [[File: MistWraithSquare.png|20px|link=Senna#Absolution]] [[Senna#Absolution|Mist Wraiths]] and [[Champion_summoned_units#Targetable|any other attack-interactive units]] are {{tt|''considered'' basic attacked once|Piercing Darkness doesn't actually apply basic damage}}, while {{tip|champions}} and {{tip|turrets}}{{tt|*|Considers all turret-specific rules}} are applied {{tip|on-hit}} effects at 100% effectiveness.
Basic attacks {{sti|cdr|reduce}} ''Piercing Darkness' '' cooldown by 1 second {{tip|on-hit}}.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Senna fires a spectral laser in the direction of the target unit, healing herself and allied champions hit, and dealing physical damage to enemies hit in a thinner line. Enemies hit are slowed by 15% (+ 10% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 6% per 100 AP) for a few seconds. The damage applies Unknown value: stil / life steal at 100% effectiveness.
Upon being hit, enemy turrets, wards, jungle plants, File: MistWraithSquare.png Senna#Absolution and Champion_summoned_units#Targetable are considered basic attacked once, while champions and turrets* are applied on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
Basic attacks reduce Piercing Darkness' cooldown by 1 second on-hit.
q1.notes:
* ''Piercing Darkness'' also applies most {{tip|on-attack}} effects to one enemy champion struck, and ocassionally to two.{{bug|2}}
** {{ri|Hail of Blades}} will spend a stack on hitting a champion with ''Piercing Darkness'' but only if {{ri|Hail of Blades}} was activated first by an auto-attack.
* ''Piercing Darkness' ''cast time is always 80% of the caster's attack windup time.
** Because '''Senna's''' windup percent scales down with levels but her windup time also only scales with 60% attack speed, the precise numbers get complicated quickly.
** At base attack speed and level 1, '''Senna's''' attack windup is {{fd|0.5}} seconds.
<!-- ** The exact simplified formula to calculate the cast time is [ {{fd|0.XX}}-{{fd|0.XX}} seconds (based on level) divided by X% {{as|'''total''' attack speed|attack speed}} ]. TODO: do.-->
** Reducing '''Senna's''' attack speed via {{tip|cripple|attack speed reductions}} also increases ''Piercing Darkness' ''cast time by 60% of the fraction.
<!-- ** It is calculated from '''Senna's''' total attack speed after cap (2.5) and floor (0.2), making the maximum possible cast time {{rutngt|X.XX}}. TODO: calculate-->
** ''Piercing Darkness' ''cast time reduction per level via her own windup-per-level-reduction mirrors {{cais|Piercing Light|Lucian}} cast time values.
<!-- todo: table? -->

* '''Senna''' can generally target anything that is not either explicitly {{tip|untargetable}} or herself.
** Valid targets include anything that can be targeted by a basic attack from someone.
* ''Piercing Darkness'' will attempt to lead the target if it is moving but does not adjust further during cast time (enemies can dodge the laser if they change their position by a sufficient amount during the cast time).
** It leads by (up-to?) 80 units.
* On-hit effects are applied in order of struck units' spawn IDs. This matters for effects that are consumed on-hit (e.g. {{ii|Duskblade of Draktharr}}, {{tip|Spellblade}}), which are applied to the target with the lowest {{tt|Spawn ID|among enemy champions, this would also be the enemy first pick in Blind Pick mode}}.
** "Spawn ID" is an unofficial abbreviation to describe the spawn order for all units at the beginning of games, below are some examples.
** If '''Senna''' targets an enemy champion but hits at least one more enemy champion simultaneously, {{ris|Press the Attack}} first stack will be applied to that target. If no champion was targeted, it will default to the champion with the lowest Spawn ID out of the ones struck by the ability. Whether the effect stacks up on a champion or not when multiple enemy champions are stuck also depends on Spawn ID.
** If ''Piercing Darkness'' struck an enemy champion and turret simultaneously, with {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}} fully charged, the passive effect will most likely proc on the turret since towers are often spawned before champions.
* For on-attack effects, they are also applied in order of struck units' spawn IDs. However, there are some specific on-attack effects that will apply to both the target of ''Piercing Darkness'' and the target with the lowest {{tt|Spawn ID|among enemy champions, this would also be the enemy first pick in Blind Pick mode}} if the two unit is not identical. {{bug|2}} {{tt|Confirmed cases|all under condition that the targeted enemy champion is not having lowest Spawn ID among all struck enemy champions}}:
**{{nie|Energized}} effects are stacked 2 stacks
**{{nie|Spectral Waltz}} are granted 2 stacks
**{{Pending for test}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent on-hit effects from being applied.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Piercing Darkness'' interaction with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.
{{Piercing Darkness lethality calculations}}

effects.str:
• Healing: (+ 30% bonus AD) (+ 40% AP) (+ 1.6 per 1 Lethality)
  • Physical Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD)
  • Slow Duration:

st_slices: (+ 30% bonus AD) (+ 40% AP) (+ 1.6 per 1 Lethality)

w1.name: Last_Embrace
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to the first enemy hit and attaches to them for 1 second.
After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target, {{tip|root|rooting}} them and surrounding enemies for a few seconds.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Senna throws a globule of Black Mist in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and attaches to them for 1 second.
After the duration or when the target dies, the Black Mist spreads out of the target, rooting them and surrounding enemies for a few seconds.
w1.notes:
* ''Last Embrace'' will not {{tip|root}} the primary target if they are {{tip|untargetable}}.
{{Effect at cast time end}}

e1.name: Curse_of_the_Black_Mist
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' surrounds herself with an [[aura]] of mist and gains {{tip|camouflage}} for a duration. If '''Senna''' {{tt|breaks the camouflage|Attacking, casting abilities, etc}}, she regains it after {{fd|1.75}} seconds without performing actions that [[Stealth#Breaking stealth|break stealth]].
Allied champions who enter the mist gain ''Wraith Form'' for a duration equal to the remaining duration.

{{sbc|Wraith Form:}} Gain {{tip|camouflage}}. Enemies will have {{tip|obscured vision}} of camouflaged ''Wraiths'' moving outside of the mist. ''Wraith Form'' can be regained if lost by breaking the camouflage after {{fd|1.75}} seconds without performing actions that break stealth. ''Wraith Form'' ends immediately upon '''Senna's''' {{tip|death}}.
'''Senna''' and allies camouflaged by ''Curse of the Black Mist'' also gain {{sti|ms|{{as|20%|ms}}}} {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Senna surrounds herself with an aura of mist and gains camouflage for a duration. If Senna breaks the camouflage, she regains it after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that Stealth#Breaking stealth.
Allied champions who enter the mist gain Wraith Form for a duration equal to the remaining duration.
Wraith Form: Gain camouflage. Enemies will have obscured vision of camouflaged Wraiths moving outside of the mist. Wraith Form can be regained if lost by breaking the camouflage after 1.75 seconds without performing actions that break stealth. Wraith Form ends immediately upon Senna's death.
Senna and allies camouflaged by Curse of the Black Mist also gain 20% (+ 5% per 100 AP) bonus movement speed.
e1.notes:
* '''Senna''' can move while casting.
* Allies affected by the ''Curse of the Blast Mist'' aura receive a buff called ''Cloak of Mist''.
* Obscured units appear as ''Wraiths'', hence the name. The wraith model does not distinguish which champion is obscured.
** On the [[Map (League of Legends)|mini-map]], obscured champions will be displayed as wraith icons instead of champion icons to the enemy team.
* In-game, the 'Cloak of Mist' buff grants camouflage and the 'Wraith Form' buff obscures the unit and grants movement speed. However, 'Cloak of Mist' has the unspecified effect of negating the obscuring effects of 'Wraith Form' (i.e. the unit is not a wraith while inside the mist); the unit has the bonus movement speed even when they are not a wraith (e.g. inside the mist or an enemy is nearby); and 'Wraith Form' also grants the functionality of camouflage (i.e. the unit is treated as a camouflaged unit with regards to {{tip|True Sight}}, {{ii|Control Ward|Control Wards}}, and enemy {{tip|champions}}).
** Given this overly complex interaction between the two buffs granted as well as the overlapping effects, it is easier to describe the effects as a single buff that is modified in specific circumstances rather than trying to establish a new game mechanic.
** '''Senna''' likewise has her aura buff and the 'Wraith Form' buff, but her 'Wraith Form' does not share gameplay functionality with other allies benefiting from Wraith Form. For '''Senna''', the appearance of being a wraith is a form-swap while camouflaged (similar to {{cai|Demon Shade|Evelynn}}). '''Senna''' will remain in her wraith form when she is detected so long as the camouflage effect isn't broken, and her wraith's appearance is very distinct from other wraiths.
* Allied champions who enter the mist and have {{tip|stealth}} of their own will still gain the ''Wraith Form'' buff but they will not grant {{tip|obscured vision}} of themselves to the enemy while out of the mist nor will they appear as a ''Wraith''.
** Allies who have their own {{tip|camouflage}} and also have ''Wraith Form'' will be revealed to enemies from their stealth's detection range, not ''Wraith Form's''.
* ''Curse of the Black Mist'' will not activate if '''Senna''' enters {{tip|resurrection}} during the cast time.
* ''Wraith Form'' will not be granted to allies that are in a {{tip|zombie state}} or are {{tip|channel|channeling}}. It will be granted to allies even if they are {{tip|untargetable}}.

r1.name: Dawning_Shadow
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Senna''' fires two waves of spectral light in the target direction, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area briefly along the path. The center wave deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemy {{tip|champions}} hit and {{tip|standard sight|reveals}} them for 3 seconds. It also collects {{ai|Absolution|Senna|Mist Wraiths}} it hits.
The broad wave {{tip|shields}} '''Senna''' and allied champions hit for 3 seconds.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Senna fires two waves of spectral light in the target direction, granting sight of the area briefly along the path. The center wave deals physical damage to enemy champions hit and reveals them for 3 seconds. It also collects Senna's Mist Wraiths it hits.
The broad wave shields Senna and allied champions hit for 3 seconds.
r1.notes:
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* '''Senna''' reveals herself during the cast time.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 70% AP)

• Shield: (+ 40% AP)
    (+ 1.5 per Senna's Mist collected)

st_slices:
(+ 40% AP)
(+ 1.5 per Senna's Mist collected)
